title: The cleint needs to change.
body:
I feel like every other day i'm writing in like this. {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} 
FIX THE CLIENT!!! i know this wont reach the right people but its genuinely saddening.

before the UNNECESARY aesthetic update to the client, i didn't find myself having these issues

1) Immensely slow loading times
2) Champion selection bugs (i.e clicking lock in and nothing happened and you get a queue dodge timer (what just tipped me over the edge and made me write this)

i seriously don't understand why there is any issue when i'm sitting here with 4 MB upload and 30MB download speeds.
there really is no excuse for a game estimated to have grossed 20 billion US dollars to have such a major flaw.
i'm mainly writing this to vent my anger so i'm not tilted in my next game, but its seriously ticking me off. the chat works, discord works youtube works, and i'm sitting here getting told that I left the lobby when in reality i checked all the prerequisites of joining the game
                                                                                           {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body:
* Try enabling **Low Spec Mode** in your client (Settings > Enable Low Spec Mode)
* Try **lowering the resolution** of your client (Settings > Window Size)
